content: *materials * - hook size i i use boye brand - yarn any 4ply worsted weight yarn red heart yarn works really well - plastic canvas needle *difficulty level i rate this pattern difficult because there are so many pieces to the pattern and some sewing is involved bible size 5 3/4 x 8 3/8 x 1 1/2 thick **português ** capa para bíblia 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/capa-para-biblia
